name: ts-results-es
description: A typescript implementation of Rust's Result and Option objects.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: copyfiles README.md LICENSE src/package.json dist --flat && copyfiles src/rxjs-operators/package.json dist/cjs --up 1 && cp package-cjs.json dist/cjs/package.json && cp package-esm.json dist/esm/package.json
